channel.title: [Class suggestion] Detective/Private Investigator (BD/Unseen Social)
channel.description:
Detective - Blue Dragon Social
Day Ability: Interagate - Send someone an anonymous message. They will be given a box to reply with. (Unlimited. 1 day cooldown)
Night Ability 1: Collect Intreague - Reveal all whispers to and from the target. Can only target the dead (Unlimited) Night Ability 2: Examine - Learn all the classes that visited your target on the night of thier death. If the target was possessed then they will be seen as Possessor. (Unlimited)
Private Investigator - Unseen Social
Day Ability: Interagate - Send someone an anonymous message. They will be given a box to reply with. (Unlimited. 1 day cooldown)
Night Ability 1: Collect Intreague - Reveal all whispers to and from the target. Can only target the dead (Unlimited) Night Ability 2: Bug - Reveal the classes (not players) that visit your target. (Unlimited)

item.title: [Class suggestion] Detective/Private Investigator (BD/Unseen Social)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Detective - Blue Dragon Social

Day Ability: Interagate - Send someone an anonymous message. They will be given a box to reply with. (Unlimited. 1 day cooldown)

Night Ability 1: Collect Intreague - Reveal all whispers to and from the target. Can only target the dead (Unlimited)
Night Ability 2: Examine - Learn all the classes that visited your target on the night of thier death. If the target was possessed then they will be seen as Possessor. (Unlimited)

Private Investigator - Unseen Social

Day Ability: Interagate - Send someone an anonymous message. They will be given a box to reply with. (Unlimited. 1 day cooldown)

Night Ability 1: Collect Intreague - Reveal all whispers to and from the target. Can only target the dead (Unlimited)
Night Ability 2: Bug - Reveal the classes (not players) that visit your target. (Unlimited)
